miraheze-label-managewiki-article-path-r: Don't use /wiki/ for articles (use the root path)
miraheze-label-managewiki-mainpage-is-do: Make the main page of this wiki use the domain root?
miraheze-sitenotice-closed-locked: This wiki has been closed because [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Stewards|Stewards]] or [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Trust and Safety|Trust and Safety]] have determined that it violates Miraheze's [[m:Content Policy|Content Policy]] or other global policies. Bureaucrats should have received either an email or talk page message with more information, including how to appeal.
miraheze-sitenotice-closed-private: This wiki has been automatically closed because there have been '''no edits''' or '''log actions''' made within the last 120 days. Since this wiki is private, it cannot be reopened by any user through the normal reopening request process. If this wiki is not reopened within 6 months, it may be deleted. Note: If you are a bureaucrat on this wiki, you can go to [[Special:ManageWiki]] and uncheck the "Closed" box to reopen it.
miraheze-sitenotice-closed: This wiki has been automatically [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Dormancy Policy|closed]] because there have been '''no edits''' or '''log actions''' made within the last 120 days. If you are a user (who is not the bureaucrat) that wishes for this wiki to be reopened, please request that at [[m:Requests for reopening wikis|Requests for reopening wikis]]. If this wiki is not reopened within 6 months it may be deleted. Note: If you are a bureaucrat on this wiki, you can go to [[Special:ManageWiki]] and uncheck the "Closed" box to reopen it.
miraheze-sitenotice-inactive-private: This wiki has had '''no edits''' or '''log actions''' made within the last 60 days and has been automatically marked as '''inactive'''. If you would like to prevent this wiki from being '''closed''', please start showing signs of activity here. If there are no signs of this wiki being used within the next 60 days, this wiki will be closed in accordance to the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Dormancy Policy|Dormancy Policy]] (which all wiki founders accept when requesting a wiki). This wiki (being private) is not be eligible to be reopened by another user upon request as normal public wikis are. If this wiki is still inactive 135 days from now, this wiki will become eligible for '''deletion'''. Note: If you are a bureaucrat, you can go to [[Special:ManageWiki]] and uncheck "inactive" yourself.
miraheze-sitenotice-inactive: This wiki has had '''no edits''' or '''log actions''' made within the last 60 days and has been automatically marked as '''inactive'''. If you would like to prevent this wiki from being '''closed''', please start showing signs of activity here. If there are no signs of this wiki being used within the next 60 days, this wiki will be closed in accordance to the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Dormancy Policy|Dormancy Policy]] (which all wiki founders accept when requesting a wiki). If this wiki is closed and no one reopens it 135 days from now, this wiki will become eligible for '''deletion'''. Note: If you are a bureaucrat, you can go to [[Special:ManageWiki]] and uncheck "inactive" yourself.
miraheze-warnmessage: [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Stewards%27_noticeboard '''Miraheze Staff'''] has noticed that this wiki has [[Special:RecentChanges|'''no edits''']] or [[Special:Logs|'''logs''']] made within the last 45 days. If you would like to prevent this wiki from being '''closed''', please start showing signs of activity here. If there are no signs of this wiki being used within the next 15 days, this wiki may be closed per the [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Dormancy_Policy '''Dormancy Policy''']. This wiki will then be eligible for adoption by another user. If not adopted and still inactive 135 days from now, this wiki will become eligible for '''deletion'''. Please be sure to familiarize yourself with Miraheze's [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Dormancy_Policy Dormancy Policy]. If there is activity on this wiki you can go on [[MediaWiki:Sitenotice]] and remove this notice yourself. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Stewards%27_noticeboard '''Contact Us'''].
mirahezemagic-description: MediaWiki messages, scripts and hooks specific for Miraheze
requestcustomdomain-text:
Thank you for choosing Miraheze!

Before getting started, make sure to read [[Custom domains]]. Your domain must be pointed correctly before making a custom domain request. Note that you can only request a custom domain once your wiki request is approved and wiki created.

In most cases, provided your domain is correctly configured and you are a wiki bureaucrat, your custom domain should be configured in a minute or less. If there is an error, or if you would like to request a redirect, please create a task on [[Phorge]].
requestimport-text:
Welcome to RequestImport! To get started with your import, please fill out this form so we can review your request. Your wiki request will be reviewed by a Technology team member or Steward, and it can be tracked at the page that will be given when submitting your request.

If your upload here times out or fails, please create a task on [[Phorge]].

If you wish to import images as well, please also create a task on [[Phorge]].
requestwiki-label-nsfw: This wiki includes content that is not safe for work (NSFW)
requestwiki-help-nsfw: A wiki includes content that not safe for work (NSFW) if it includes graphic discussion of sex (either text or media content) or content which is otherwise inappropriate for those under the age of 18.
requestwiki-label-nsfwtext: Please give us more details about the type of NSFW content that your wiki will contain
requestwiki-label-nsfw-primary: This wiki primarily focuses on content that is not safe to work (NSFW)
requestwiki-help-nsfw-primary: A wiki primarily focuses on NSFW content if its main scope covers material usually marked as NSFW (a book, movies, games, etc), is a wiki where most content itself is NSFW, or otherwise focuses on content which would typically fall under an age confirmation or separation in casual settings. It does not mean cases where the wiki occasionally covers NSFW material as part of a larger work or subject.
requestwiki-label-source: This wiki is moving or forking from an existing wiki
requestwiki-label-sourceurl: Enter the full URL of the source wiki (the wiki you are moving or forking from)
sitematrix-summary: This special page lists all Miraheze wikis.
vanishuser-action-label: Do you '''really''' want to vanish this user?
vanishuser-action-help: Please make sure all details are filled out correctly and make sure to log this.
vanishuser-warning: '''Warning''': You are about to globally vanish a user! Please review all details carefully before proceeding.
vanishuser-log-header: This is a basic log of all user vanishes.
echo-pref-tooltip-mirahezemagic-tech-not: Notify me when there are technical changes affecting my wiki.
